name: La-Goon (VR)
description:
Description

A semester-long VR project made for the HTC Vive. The player ("Robert Doback") must protect his baby son ("Dale") from an onslaught of vaguely tropical animals. Original models, mostly original textures, 50/50 split of Creative Commons and original audio.

***Controls***
Use triggers to pickup / release weapons. Gun will bind to first hand that picks it up - then use that hand's trigger to suck up / shoot weapons.

***Minimum Specs***
Intel™ Core™ i5-4590 (or equivalent),  NVIDIA GeForce™ GTX 1060 (or equivalent), 4GB ram, Windows 8

***Team***
Akito Roberge (Environment + Models)
Curtis McCrady (Models)

Mark Brouwer (AI + Models)
